subject: Hockey, Ice
lead_paragraph: Just before what was probably the Devils’ biggest game in a strange season, goaltender Martin Brodeur, wearing a dark suit, found a seat in a plush suite in the third deck at Prudential Center on Tuesday, far above his usual spot.
snippet: Just before what was probably the Devils’ biggest game in a strange season, goaltender Martin Brodeur, wearing a dark suit, found a seat in a plush suite in the third deck at Prudential Center on Tuesday, far above his usual spot.
